name: Jolly Bunny's Adventure
description:
The story of a cheerful rabbit embarking on a journey to meet the unknown. What lies ahead for him, what is he looking for, what obstacles will he encounter on his way? This is all for the player to find out.

Where did he go from the familiar green forest, through mountains and snow, for what purpose? The rabbit's courage and resourcefulness will surely remain rewarded.

You will lead this Jolly Bunny through his adventure, overcome obstacles such as a chasm cave, icy mountain cliffs full of ice thorns, a dangerous sawmill with deadly saws, a mysterious laboratory. You have to jump as high as possible and be extremely careful on your adventure. You have to go through a path full of dangers together with the rabbit in order to understand the purpose for which he went on an adventure.

Features:
  • 7 bright, enjoyable levels with hand-drawn pixel art
  • exciting unusual gameplay
  • great 8bit soundtrack
  • Collect coins to open bonus level
  • pleasant controls
